lines.text: What do you WANT?
I want
[points at her glass eye]
THAT!
[Joan has crushed Justin's arm in a door, he manages to force it open knocking her to the ground]
[enraged]
You... hurt me!
[Joan screams]
[Justin pulls out his Jack Knife and brutally stabs her]
Don't you ever run away from me!

[about Lara]
So she's in alot of trouble right?
Forget her the scumbag she ran off with the fucker's gonna wish he'd never been born

[angrily pulling out his jack knife and sticking it too Lawson's neck]
No i'm not
[Seeing the cab outside]
[loudly]
Hey, did anyone order a cab?
I'm looking for a women
Aren't we all?

[poking the trucker]
LOOK MAN, I'M TIRED, I'M PISSED, I'M READY TO KILL

[on seeing his little sister's murder by his mother]
IT'S IN MY HEAD! YOU THINK I CAN TURN IT OFF... LIKE A TV?

[snatching away a gun pointed at him]
Sorry, maam, firearms aren't allowed on this bus.

[on Lawson surviving the crash]
This guy's got more lives than a cat!
[last lines]
That was some crash!

[showing a polaroid]
Yeah... hey, look, I took a picture!

[reasoning with Justin]
Justin remember when you first came here... you couldn't even speak.
